title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1V Calle Castillo del Inglés
description: Spacious, beautiful, relaxed parking in residential area. 5 minutes from city center. Beautiful view of the ocean right next to it. Also a little plaza with trees and benches. No amenities.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Av. Isabel Manoja, 2
description: Super laundry written in French and English not too expensive , there is wifi and a socket.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Castillo del Inglés
description: Quiet area to park and spend the night.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15 Calle Decano Higueras del Castillo
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 15 Calle Decano Higueras del Castillo
description: Simple parking, but close to the sea and the nightlife. Parking (abusive?) During the day. Only for cars and vans of medium size. No camper> 6m very busy

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 33 Ramal del Carmelo
description: Day parking next to the Battery park. hours from 9:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. with doors closing. No services. Quiet parking area during the day next to a large and colorful park, ideal for disconnecting and taking a walk with the family.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Carril de los Manantiales
description: Large parking lot next to the beautiful picnic area. Lots of traffic but check! Peaceful area.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 11 Calle Río Aranda
description:
Self service laundry, extremely clean.
washing 12kg, 20kg, dryers 12kg, 18kg for 20mins

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7 Calle Periodista Federico Alba
description: Large parking lot next to the company Aguas de Torremolinos. It is a quiet area near Aqualand which also has fairly flat areas. The beach is quite far. There are services like supermarkets or bars nearby.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida de los Manantiales
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida de los Manantiales
description:
Laundry. Self-service. Detergent including.
2 * 8 kg washers for 3 EUR, 30 minutes at 40° C
3 * 14 kg washers for 5 EUR
3 * 14 kg dryers for 1 EUR, 10 minutes (30 minutes recommend at highest temperature).
Wi-Fi, security camera. Inside the SuperSol supermarket. Open only when supermarket is open. Table and chairs.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14 Calle Cuba
description: Parking next to Aqualand Torremolinos. There is a little spot next to Aqualand parking which is free, just don't park to aqualand parking.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 16 Calle Boscán
description: Free public parking open from 8h to 22h convenient for visiting the city center

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 6 Calle Pedro Navarro Bruna
description: Free parking next to sports facilities (they have bathrooms) and Auditorium. We have been only one night (Saturday). Incredible, without any noise, maximum tranquility. I understand that other weekends if there are sporting events it will be full of cars. There are more than 60 places. The sports facilities are open to the public for use, both outdoors and covered pavilion.

title: (29620) Torremolinos -
description: Mixed paved car park with marked lines, close to the center of Torremolinos. SUPECO, LIDL and ALDI at 200m.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 251 Avenida San Anton
description: Clean drinking water and deposit for grey water

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Decano Fdez. y Maqueda
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Decano Fdez. y Maqueda
description: It is a fairly large outdoor open space, next to the train tracks and the Benalmádena-Torremolinos road ... very quiet and peaceful place to spend the night

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle México
description: Gravel parking, is located above, overlooking the sea, no service !!

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril
description: Very quiet street in a residential area and further from the highway, so there is no noise. CC Carrefour nearby and beach 20mn on foot.

address.street: 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Camino de los Pinares
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Camino de los Pinares
description: Drinking water

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida San Anton
description: Nice parking, next to the forest picnic/grill area, very quiet, acces to the drinkable water with minerals, also just next to the stadion public showers and toilets :) There is like sport area with swimming pools, football, tennis. Also 15min from the city and beach. There is many free parking around so you can fine your favorite. We stayed here 5 nights, without problem, had grill and using the showers.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle del Remo
description: Close to the beach, bars and restaurants. Just for the day. Ok for a van but large campers would have difficulty manoeuvring. Busy on weekends. Beach showers and toilets nearby. Some bars have free wifi.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Ronda Alta de Benyamina
description:
Parking with a little unevenness, it is very close to the beach. with restaurant and supermarkets nearby. gas station 200 meters.
night and day no problem
no services

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Camino de los Pinares
description: Picnic area with water taps and barbeques. Very popular amongst the locals so it can be noicy.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7 Calle Salvador Allende
description: Place in Carihuela Beach. Calm. Dead end.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 23 Calle del Sanatorio
description: Parking on the street. Usually buses are also parked there. About 300 m from the beach. A few bars nearby

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14K Costa de la Carihuela
description: Small place but close to the beach

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle Decano Juan de Espino
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle Decano Juan de Espino
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Near the beach and various services.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 11 Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking in front of the valid sea off season. forbidden only for small vans RV.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 29 Calle Madre Teresa de Calcuta
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 29 Calle Madre Teresa de Calcuta
description: Parking at the foot of the urbanization and polygon...quiet...

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 85 Calle Corelli
description: Very quiet parking lot to spend the night

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15R Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Park up on the beach. Toilets opposite. Quite busy

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle del Sanatorio
description: Maritime hospital parking. It is a quiet clearing 200 meters from the beach. You can use the showers and toilets on the beach. There are many beach bars and entertainment areas nearby. You can sleep without problem, although there are many parrots and they do not shut up as soon as they light up. Otherwise, nobody bothered us.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 10 Avenida Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Self-service laundry

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7V Urbanizacion SUPR1. 1
description: Just a parking lot. Quiet and lots of space

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15K Paseo Marítimo
description:
Only for smaller vans allowed. Nerby hotel, but very quiet place off-season. If you come after 8p.m. and leave before 9a.m. you can stay for free, otherwise you´ll pay at least 1 euro per day. 
Nice view on the sea, lot´s of space. It´s possible to take a "shower" at the beach.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Parroco Florencio Aguilar
description: Excellent parking to spend the night or to leave the motorhome and leave to know the city, very close to Malaga. Quiet zone

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Gas station where it is possible to spend the night. Wifi open and free at the cafeteria. There is a shower 3,50euros at the cafeteria also. Step to remember if you have no choice because the proximity of the fast lane ensures a sleepless night!

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 1 Calle La Fragata
description: Laundry

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14 Calle Diego Franco Cantos
description: Parking in a dead end, 200m from the beach, opposite a small park and a children's play area

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 20 Avenida de la Encina
description: It is a place where vehicles pass a one-way street, we spend the night and the beach goes down very well at 300 meters. Bars of drinks at 5 minutes walk.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Cafeteria called "Cafestore" where, apart from food, they offer showers. The beach is very close. It is expensive. No LPG/Autogas here

title: (29630) Benalmádena - C. La Fragata
description: Paid parking at the marina. No signs prohibiting RVs.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 10 Calle Andres Segovia
description: Quiet and shady car park, in the upper part of the city, closed-end street. No service

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 78 Avenida de Manuel Fraga Iribarne
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 78 Avenida de Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Self-service laundry 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Buy tokens at the Repsol garage. 4x8kg machines plus one for pet items 3x14kg machines and 4 dryers. Washing takes about 1 hour, tumble drying 30 minutes. I used the 80% warm option for bedding, 60% medium for clothes

name: Camping Torremolinos
title: (29620) Camping Torremolinos
description: Far to expensive at €40 a night for 2 adults with electric. Campsite as no swimming pool, restaurant or bar. Maybe this is why they can justify charging this price.

title: (29004) Torremolinos - 20K Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Large free parking in gravel and grass without services. The entrance is in front of the Mata Mura restaurant accessible in this season. a little noisy during the day by planes

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 1 Avenida Gamonal
description: Launderette SpeedQueen - washing possible up to 90 degrees - 6 washing machines, 4 dryers - detergent is already included. Not very clean, washing machines need a thorough cleaning. Washing up to 90 degrees is possible.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - Av. Federico Garcia Lorca
description: Long parking for 6-meter motorhomes

title: (29004) Torremolinos - Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Authorized parking along the beach, possibility for ten motorhomes, beach shower, calm nights, no problem, beware the only one parking still accessible, not limited by a bar, the Guardia often passes no worries a quality cycle path nearby.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 17 Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: Repsol gas station. Exchange of gas bottles. No LPG. Cafe area. Washing machines and tumble dryers. Extra washing machine for pet items.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 2 Avenida Gamonal
description: Lacolada laundromat - washing possible up to 40 degrees, according to the owner, the detergent contains disinfectant so that the washing does not have to be hotter. Operation of the machines in several languages (also German). Super clean, new machines and owners right next door (iHomes properties)

title: (29004) Málaga - 4 Camino de la Cizaña
description: Just some rough waste land where vans are now parking due to the other 2 parking places now only for below 2m height restriction. Plenty of vans here parked no problem on flat land right next to the sea & underneath flight path so intermittent noise during the night. Camping forbidden.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 6 Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: It is the Pueblo Quinta car park. In winter it is very quiet. Very central, with a nice walk to the marina, La Carihuela and Torremolinos. Beach and restaurant area.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 7 Avenida de Rocío Jurado
description: Row parking, street side (south possible for a 6-7 meters) drinking water in the park, toilet and children's play module that is really worth the trip. Access to the municipal swimming pool at 5 minutes on foot, mercadona at 5 minutes and repsol laundry at 200m.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
title: (29630) Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
title_short: (29630) Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
description: Free camper place for max 72 hours, often full, with water change service. Beach 500 meters away. Parking and restaurant nearby. It is forbidden to set up tables and chairs.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 35 Calle Andrómeda
description: Free parking next to the Tivoli. Friday morning closed for flea market. Very spacious

title: (29630) - 9P Terreno SP-2 Santangelo Norte
description: Very quiet high area, with many streets without problem to park and far from the houses. There are several tourist trails a few meters away.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - Nº 6 Calle Pepa Guerra Valdenebro
title_short: (29631) Benalmádena - Nº 6 Calle Pepa Guerra Valdenebro
description: Very clean and comfortable laundromat. Owners were very friendly as well.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 112 Avenida Antonio Machado
description: M3 Petroleum gas station with drinking water to fill the clean water tank. Very friendly and cheaper gasoline

title: (29004) Málaga - 4 Calle Alfonso Ponce de León
title_short: (29004) Málaga - 4 Calle Alfonso Ponce de León
description: Emptying area next to the Shell service station next to the Plaza Mayor shopping center in Malaga. Possible to fill water against but not drinkable. Places available nearby to go shopping.

title: (29004) Málaga - 5 Calle Victoria de los Ángeles
title_short: (29004) Málaga - 5 Calle Victoria de los Ángeles
description: March 19, 2019. Great place to sleep functionally. No beautiful surroundings or facilities available. Well calm. In the morning some traffic from cars parking there.

title: (29140) Málaga -
description: Parking near Ikea and shopping centre! Very busy during the day and partly loud due to the nearby airport!

title: (29620) Torremolinos - C. Alfonso Ponce De Leon
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - C. Alfonso Ponce De Leon
description: Shopping center parking, next to bus parking spaces. If your motorhome is small or it is a van, I think you will be able to park without problems, since the rear curb is below the vehicle.

title: (29140) Málaga - 24 Carretera de Álora
description: Ideal parking with bars and restaurants. Park for children next.

title: (29004) Málaga - 3 Avenida Enrique Granados

title: (29004) Málaga - Carril vereda de la carne, s/n

title: (29004) Málaga - 1 Avenida Enrique Granados
description: Regular free parking along the road! Free for big motorhomes to visit shops nearby. We also stayed at night, a little noisy due to the highway and planes.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 52 Carretera Cádiz
description: Free parking 100 m from the beach.

title: (29130) - 3C Terreno Ur
description: Quiet place, but without services. Good to spend a night. You can go mountain biking and trail runing around. There is an Aldi at 100m

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 73-81 Avenida del Sol
description: It is a parking small spot just off the N 340, Has 5 Spaces in Benalmadena, between the best hotel Benalmadena and the torrequebrada. There is a sign for a restaurant called La Cala. There is always some AC parked and there are usually no problems as long as you take nothing out. Lovely views of the sea and close to a super and gas station

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 7 Terreno SP-8 Santangelo Oeste
description: Very quiet place in the upper parts of urbanizations. Plenty of parking, garbage nearby and a very quiet area. At the back there is a bridge that leads to the mountain with different paths, views of part of Benalmádena.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 60 Calle Santa Barbara
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 60 Calle Santa Barbara
description: Large parking bay in a quiet residential street.  Good place to stop overnight if you have a large motorhome. Good dog walking area alongside the road. Aldi & petrol station just up the road

title: (29004) Málaga -
description: Large parking by the sea. Numerous spaces.

title: (29004) Málaga - 7 Calle Argonautas

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 59 Avenida Retamar
description: Ample place to park. Near the town, the stupa and the butterfly farm. Very quiet area with no slope on this straight. We spent the night without problem

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Avenida Isaac Peral
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Avenida Isaac Peral

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 9 Zona Ue-Pa-02
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 9 Zona Ue-Pa-02
description: Pressure car wash for vehicles up to 3.10 m high, with a gun for tires and a platform on one side for better access to the roof. It works with coins and has a coin exchange machine.

title: (29004) Málaga - 1805 Calle Miguel de Merida Nicolich
title_short: (29004) Málaga - 1805 Calle Miguel de Merida Nicolich
description: 4 parking lanes next to the stadium, there were about ten of us, mostly liners with trailers, easy access, lit

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 5 Calle Muerdago
description: Water fountain with enough pressure for filling. located inside the playground. Water bottles necessary.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 53P Calle del Mejicano
description: Parking next to the beach and quiet

title: (29004) Málaga - 8 Calle Marilyn Monroe
description: Parking in the middle of a sports complex. Places to park. No services. Something to walk the dog. A busy road in the background. We were several vans parked. Access probably difficult with CC

title: (29004) Málaga - 3 Avenida Alicia de Larrocha
description: Long street with many free parking spots, possibility to park diagonally if your vehicle is long. Good for getting groceries, Mercadona and Lidl close by.

title: (29004) Málaga - 113 Camino de la Térmica
description: Large plot next to the sea very close to Malaga and the natural park. Former butane plant. It has next to a cycle path that reaches Malaga itself with many gardens and leisure areas.

title: (29004) Málaga - 28 Diseminado R36
description: Well leveled asphalt car parks. About 20 spaces if they were parked well. Do not worry. There are quite a few rental electric scooters at the entrance that you can see that people use to go downtown and back. Without services and close to the beach.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - Calle Heliotropo
description: Free parking right at the Buddhist stupa in Benalmadena. Wonderful view of the building, the city and the sea. Buddhists say that this place is very powerful and suitable for making good wishes. During the opening hours of approx. 10- 19 (siesta from 14-16) o'clock the stupa can also be visited, as well as the toilet are used. The butterfly park also invites you to visit. Small sports field and playground for the children.

title: (29004) Málaga - C. Lexicógrafa María Moliner
description: The space has been completely closed to parking since February 7, 2022 from 00:00 to 09:00. Very ample and clean paved DAY parking, there are services. Markets very close. Carrefour, Lidl, Mercadona. A clinic one step away. Optional metro and bus line (7-31) that will take you directly to the shopping center. More than 150 motorhomes can participate. Banned overnight.

title: (29004) Málaga - C. Lexicógrafa María Moliner
description: Free. Water point

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 3 Calle Rododendro
description: Parking near a Tibetan pagoda with views over Benalmadena

title: (29004) Málaga - 82A Carretera de la Azucarera Intelhorce
title_short: (29004) Málaga - 82A Carretera de la Azucarera Intelhorce
description: Parking in the industrial area, flanked by a pine forest. We stayed here for the night in the van. A little noisy at night and early in the morning due to trucks and cars on the main road.

title: (29004) Málaga - 48 Calle Torre del Mar
description: No Facilities

name: Playa de Sacaba
title: (29004) Playa de Sacaba
description: Very well located directly on the beach, the city center is easily accessible by bus or bicycle, no overnight camping. Parking prohibited at night for all vehicles. (From 00h00 to 09h00)

title: (29004) Málaga - 21 Carretera de la Azucarera Intelhorce
title_short: (29004) Málaga - 21 Carretera de la Azucarera Intelhorce
description: Drinking water at gas station good flow long pipes

title: (29004) Málaga - 37 Camino del Pato
description: Parking space along the street under the trees. Close to a park with great games for children, as well as bus and metro to the center of Malága.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 13 Avenida Barcelona
description: Quiet day and night parking

title: (29004) Málaga - 195 Calle Pacífico
description: Free water tap in the plaza just outside Restaurante Vicen Playa.

title: (29004) Málaga - Diseminado R20
description:
We parked here for one night before leaving our camper at ECP, 5 mins further
If you disregard the noice from the planes it's a nice spot
Bit bumby and dusty road to get there

title: (29004) Málaga - C. Hermanos Lumiere
description: Huge gravel pitch. Bus stops line 1 to the old town.

title: (29004) Málaga - 7 Calle Nereo
description: Polygon on the beachfront, 3 minutes, abundant shade, many shady parking lots and perfect for going to the beach or visiting the city of Malaga

title: (29004) Málaga - 8 Calle Viña del Mar
description: Self-service laundry

title: (29130) Pinos de Alhaurín - 55D Calle Manuel Aleixandre
title_short: (29130) Pinos de Alhaurín - 55D Calle Manuel Aleixandre
description: Good place to spend the night. Next to Venta Vázquez. Where you can have breakfast before going out to cycle in the mountains or hiking.

title: (29006) Málaga - C. Paquiro
description: Municipal parking of Malaga. Capacity for 1000 vehicle.

title: (29004) Málaga -
description: I arrived on a Saturday, you have to arrive or very early, to be able to enter and get a good seat. Parking next to the promenade!! Perfect!!!!' The police have spoken with the association and are going to start fining anyone who occupies more than one space.

title: (29130) Málaga - 6M Terreno Ur
description: Nothing special. Industrial estate but very open and nicer than others I've had to sleep in. good coverage and savings to walk a little with the dog. Quiet night even on a Friday night. no services

title: () Málaga -
description: Wide parking place at 6 km from Málaga, with benches and trash bins, amongst olive trees. Quiet during the night.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - A-404
description: Nice spot for a day or night at the start of many hikes and great downhill/enduro mountain biking. Further up is another spot but takes more climbing on gravel. Disadvantages: close to a shooting range, so during the day you hear them. Close to the street but very quiet at night. Perfect to quickly park and do a big hike. The owners of the restaurants uphill are super friendly and no problem to refill water if you ask. Spot probably not available in the weekend because it gets very busy than.

title: (29004) Málaga - 32C Calle Pacífico
description: Abandoned square used as a parking lot.  very big.  at night calmly, you can spend the night without any problems.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 154 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 154 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: At the front line of the beach. Showers every 20 meters, in front of the cybercafe cafeteria there is a toilet 24h. For vehicles till 5 meter allowed.

title: (29006) Málaga - 12 Calle Mahler
description: Descampado to park for free, without services, a piece is asphalt, the rest without asphalting, shops near and the best 20 meters from the Station of suburban trains (Victoria Kent) where in 5 min leaves you in the same center of Malaga and in the other direction the train goes to the airport or Fuengirola. One of the best alternatives to park for free and go to the airport in Malaga in 8 minutes, without having to walk at all.

title: (29006) Málaga - 6 Calle Cristóbal Ruiz Molero
description: Large car park (Parking del palacio de feria) opposite the Trade Fair and Congress Center of Malaga. Standing is probably not a problem during the day and at night. Little street noise, but in the evening some young people listening to music in the car.

title: (29003) Málaga - 26 Avenida de Europa
description: Huge parking lot on asphalt. You can't park Wednesdays or Saturdays between 8-16 due to market / mercadillo being held here - but otherwise it seems free of charge. I'm here off season and there is plenty of space. Did not spend night here, but the space is just outside of the public library - and sort of central. I parked for the library.

title: (29003) Málaga - 149 Calle Héroe de Sostoa
description: Lavomatic Lavandería Autoservicio Self-service laundromat

name: Camping Málaga Monte Parc
title: (29130) Camping Málaga Monte Parc
description:
Welcome to Camping Málaga Monte Parc.

We are located in Alhaurín de la Torre, found on the outskirts on the A404. 20KM away from Málaga Centro.

We are an in-land campsite, "en el campo", but local items include Alhaurín de la Torre and Alhaurín el Grande, both a 5 minute drive away. Lauro Golf is around the corner 5 minutes away, with Málaga Centro being easily accessible with a 20 minute drive. The beach is also around 15km away, with Los Alamos and Playa Guadalhorce being the closest.

We require a 3 night minimum stay however it is possible to stay 1-2 nights but there is a 20% supplement. 

For any further information, please consult our website or call us.

address.city: Alhaurín de la Torre, Arroyo Hondo S/N

title: (29010) Málaga - Calle Marea Alta
description: Parking 5 minutes walk from the feria at night. Paying 1 euro. No shade, otherwise no problem.

title: (29006) Málaga - 4 Calle Séptimo Miau
description: Parking at the malaga bay mall, it is very well lit, the entrance is a little high but with a little extra care you enter well. It does not have any service but there are bathrooms in the CC, they also have a HiperCor. There is no sign prohibiting large caravans. We have been here for 3 days and the civil guard has already passed several times.

title: (29006) Málaga - 15 Calle Bodegueros
description: Ground parking. Quiet. There is a gym next door and you can sign up for a week and take a good shower. There are laundry bars and supermarkets nearby.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 0 Avenida Carvajal
description: Parking along both sides of the road. Easy access to beach

title: (29010) Málaga - 3 Calle Decano Agustín Moreno
description: Parking area normally quiet theatrical zone and near the exit to the highway a few kilometers from Cercampa which is buying caravan sales and workshop with gray and black drainage area and filling, without services, bars, bakeries, supermarket, bus stop to the city center and metro and city of Justice, near the university etc at 500 meters, you can spend the night without problems usually see a legal valet of day sometimes, safe and quiet.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 125 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 125 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: Line parking on the road overlooking and near the beach.

title: (29590) Málaga - Carretera de cartama, km. 8,3
description:
Carcampa, easy disposal of gray and black water, fresh water.
 Currently under renovation, attached Carcampa permanent parking, repair service, camping items
The website says Carcampa, the sign on the wall Cercampa

title: (29650) Mijas - 21B Urbanización Torreblanca del Sol
description: Nice views, next to the discgolf park

title: (29006) Málaga - 3 Calle Corregidor Pedro Zapata
description: Public parking valid for caravans to have online parking.  No water, light or drain.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 25 Avenida Torreblanca
description: Parking parallel to the sidewalk, large motorhomes enter.

title: (29010) Málaga - 3 Bulevar Louis Pasteur
description: Free large paved car park opposite Uni - with some trees, no prohibition sign, stayed 2 nights, feels safe - metro station 5-10 mins walk / no services

title: (29002) Málaga - 96 Autovía de Acceso al Puerto de Málaga
title_short: (29002) Málaga - 96 Autovía de Acceso al Puerto de Málaga
description: Parking lot along the street. Beach directly opposite. Not for large motorhomes, only for small vans (T5 etc…) Free. We only stood here during the day. Parking ticket is required!

address.street: 96 Autovía de Acceso al Puerto de Málaga

title: (29007) Málaga - Unnamed Road
description: Free water supply

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Quiet spot in the large car park at the end of the road. A beautiful view and the beginning of a number of hiking and mountain biking trails. There's also a former quarry, now lined with trees, where we saw a deer. These are the hills where James Bond flew the gyrocopter Little Nellie in You Only Live Twice!

title: (29010) Málaga - 19 Avenida Parménides
description: Open ground enclosure. It does not have drainage services or electricity. Guarded during the day. 50 meters away there is a Mercadona and 100 meters away there is a Hospital with Emergencies. At 100 meters you find a bar area with meals of all kinds and cocktail bars. At night it is usually calm and without problems.

title: (29006) Málaga - 16 Calle Corregidor Antonio de Bobadilla
title_short: (29006) Málaga - 16 Calle Corregidor Antonio de Bobadilla
description: Great place in the shade, lots of places to park, vans can easily fit in, for campers that are too big (more than 5 m long) I'm not sure. The place is very quiet and near residential area, there is a playground next to a very good restaurant for frying. A very cheap Papas vendor across the street that you can enjoy. Recommended

title: (29010) Málaga - 9 Avenida Pablo Gargallo
description:
Large vacant lot in the middle of the buildings. Very quiet and very close to the direct bus to the city center. We spent one night and left the camper for the day without any problem.
Possible large sizes because large area and very good for walking dogs

title: (29007) Málaga - 3 Desconocido
description: Shopping center parking, easily accessible, close to the city. There is a gym next door.

title: (29010) Málaga - 5 Calle Andrómeda
description: Dirt parking next to the main avenue in Teatinos (Calle Plutarco). No services. There is usually a gorilla. It is a car park that is usually quite full at night as there are many bars nearby. We have spent a fairly quiet night although with a little noise due to the nearby bars. Surrounded by buildings. Not bad for a one night stopover. We have slept alone.

title: (29010) Málaga - 3 Calle Fiscal Luis Portero García
title_short: (29010) Málaga - 3 Calle Fiscal Luis Portero García
description: Dead end street in a quiet area, near a dirt esplanade. We have spent two nights and, except for some unpresentable skidding a couple of times with the cars, we have been calm and we have felt safe. As Malaga is for overnight stays, this place is fine if you don't need any other service.

title: (29002) Málaga - 2 Calle Orfila
description: Land parking 30 minutes from the Center. Very close to the beach. It is not worth much but it is central. We slept one night. Ne supply has come ici! On viens d'être Cambriolés! Et c'est très très sale, au passage ... Endroit à éviter !!!!!

title: (29002) Málaga - 37 Calle Ayala
description: Free water with water hose. Tight space, I could just fit with my RV (6,5m). The water seems to have a lot of chlorine in it, not tasty at all, we used it for cooking and dishes, nobody got sick from it.

title: (29590) Málaga - 16A Avenida José Ortega y Gasset
title_short: (29590) Málaga - 16A Avenida José Ortega y Gasset
description: 3 washing machines of 8 kg, 2 washing machines of 14 kg and 4 dryers on the site of a garage, 24/7

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre -
description: Gas station with Cepsa propane bottles and free non-drinking water It has a shop to buy and a bar

title: (29010) Málaga - 1 Calle Frank Capra
description: Parking to visit Málaga by bike.

title: (29650) Mijas - 50V Urbanización Torreblanca del Sol
description: Large dirt square in the middle of the hills below Mijas. Reachable via dirt roads in good condition, which can also be traveled by non-4x4 vehicles. Very quiet, there are no houses close by

title: (29007) Málaga - 9 Calle Stendhal
description:
Perfect! 3 differently sized washing machines (10,12 & 14)  2 dryers. Did my laundry in between 9 & 11am so got 1 euro shaved off the washing!
The owner is super nice to have a chat with if you're lucky to see him. I was glad to practice my Spanish!

title: (29007) Málaga - 5 Calle Luis F Pallardo Peinado
title_short: (29007) Málaga - 5 Calle Luis F Pallardo Peinado
description: Very large parking lot for parking in front of buildings. Police station nearby, downtown Malaga 15 minutes by bike.

title: (29006) Málaga - 7 Calle Horacio Lengo
description: Fairly large car park, I arrived around 4 p.m., there was plenty of space, at 7 p.m. it was full. I have a 6m van, no problem, bigger step possible without disturbing. caretaker during the day. I spent a quiet night there.

title: (29010) Málaga - 27 Calle Maestro Jiménez
description: Parking in the shade. I almost always find it free.

title: (29010) Málaga - Avenida de José Ribera
description: Quiet place, residential, university, with a lot of restaurant and drinks, five minutes walk you have metro and bus 8.23 ​​... that take you to the center of the city. You can spend the night being discreet and respecting the neighbors

title: (29002) Málaga - 11 Calle López Pinto
description: In a street between buildings in a quiet area. max length 6.50m

title: (29006) Málaga - Av. de la Aurora
description: Free park for day and night. no need to pay. secure. walking distance to center 20 min, but is a cool walk. very good

title: (29650) Mijas - 123 Carretera Mijas-Fuengirola
description: Free water point and paid laundry place for campers.

title: (29010) Málaga - 32 Carril del Capitán
description:
Street parking. Quiet zone. Next to playground and many green areas. Close to different bus stops to visit the center of Malaga.
The traffic on the street can be a bit annoying. But the area is quiet and safe to leave the vehicle and visit the city.

title: (29007) Málaga - 15 Calle Soliva
description: Parking near Carlos Haya Avenue, there are two nearby supermarkets, Mercadona and Supercor, quiet place, paid from 8 am to 8 pm

title: (29002) Málaga - 5 Calle Constancia
description: Very quiet street, we left our van there all day because the city center is within walking distance.

title: (29002) Málaga - s/n Calle Salitre
description:
"Salitre" car park in Malaga.
Height limited to 2.20, so only for small vans.
Had enough space with our T5.
It is under video surveillance and there is a guard.

In 20 minutes walk to the old town.

Haven't stayed overnight is probably not allowed either.

title: (29650) Mijas - 14 Urbanización Huerta Alta I
description: Parking with bus shuttle from 12 to 01 for Mijas super large parking 200 or more vehicles of all kinds.

title: (29650) Mijas - 11D Calle Tamisa
description: Free parking 2 minutes walk from the center of Mijas, very little crowded and flat. We spent one night there and it was very good.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 112 Avenida de los Boliches
description: On the bridge of Av. De los Boliches can be parked and stood in and out of town. There are no defined parking spaces so it is also possible for longer vehicles. Not particularly nice but close to the center. Had our bus standing there for three days when we were in town.

title: (29010) Málaga - 12 Calle Juan Francés Bosca
description: Large parking without services, noisy during the day due to the nearby roads, but quiet at night. a 5-minute walk away is a beautiful park with a lake, great for dogs or children

title: (29016) Málaga - 25 Paseo de la Farola
description:
After 1 hour of looking for a parking space for our 6m camper, we found this place.
here are e-scooters with which you can be in the center in less than 5 minutes.
for free
parking allowed from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Small parking lot without problem to sleep in front of public parking 8 spaces

title: (29650) Mijas - 8D Avenida del Compás
description: Big limit !!! FOR NORMAL VANS ONLY. Parking hall in the center "Mijas Pueblo". Easily accessible by car. Steep hill. For the day only

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 20 Calle Alcalá Galiano
description: Parking possible day and night. 2 minute walk to the main street with bakery and restaurants.

title: (29190) Málaga - 4 Calle Jorge E. Loring Oyarzábal
title_short: (29190) Málaga - 4 Calle Jorge E. Loring Oyarzábal
description: Gas station that has adblue, LPG and Lavomatic automatic laundry

title: (29650) Mijas - s/n Avenida del Compás
description: Water point down the Ermita Virgen de la Pena. Parking spaces nearby. Facing the miniature museum.

title: (29007) Málaga - 16 Calle Hilera
description: NON-paid parking with white lines, wide sidewalk, trees that provide shade and cool all day. Street with little traffic at night. 8 minutes walk from the center, Picasso Garden 5 minutes walk.

title: (29010) Málaga - 18 Calle Sondalezas
description: Large laundry

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 7 Avenida Dulcinea
description: Repsol station with LPG. Very good reception, help for the connection if necessary.

name: Parking Privado Estación Marítima de Málaga
title: (29001) Parking Privado Estación Marítima de Málaga
title_short: (29001) Parking Privado Estación Marítima de Málaga
description: Privately managed car park in the Port of Malaga. The reservation is made via the "Pango" app. Allows entry and exit during the reserved period. To get there you must enter the port and follow the indications for ferries to Melilla. It is located next to the pier's pavilion, where a Spanish flag hangs.

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: It is a public, free and small car park published in a viewpoint. Our vehicle is six meters long and it has entered just right, for campers it is ideal, you do have to be very lucky to find a space.

title: (29591) Málaga - Avenida Andersen
description: Parking in Virgen de Las Cañas Park

title: (29016) Málaga - 17 Paseo de la Farola
description: Recent and spacious public restrooms, between restaurants. Very convenient if parked along the boardwalk. Looks open 24 hours a day.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 54 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 54 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: Laundry room - 3 washers and 2 dryers.

title: (29015) Málaga - Paseo de los Curas Carretera Nacional N 340
title_short: (29015) Málaga - Paseo de los Curas Carretera Nacional N 340
description: Free, individual parking bays (my van is 6 meters long) next to the park, next to the sea. There is a large dumpster. There is a playground and public toilet in the park. We stood here at night & everything was good. In the morning it is of course louder because it is right on the street. But that wasn't a problem with ear plugs at the latest.

address.street: Paseo de los Curas Carretera Nacional N 340

title: (29590) Málaga - 2 Calle Graham Bell
description: Laundry and dryer machines in the repsol gas station. Small parking area in front of the area.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 8 Calle San Pedro
description:
Market Square, Tuesdays and Saturdays large crowd wg. Market. Plenty of restaurants all around and towards the beach (300-400 m).
So far mostly Scandinavians here.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 53 Avenida Ramón y Cajal
description: Public washing machines at the Repsol petrol station.

title: (29190) Málaga - 12 Calle Pirita
description: Barrier-free public parking. Free admission. Tuesdays is market day and they occupy the area very early. There are no camper services, but right next door you have a pharmacy and places to eat.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 158 Calle Recinto Ferial
description: Parking near centre of town

title: (29016) Málaga - 23 Paseo Marítimo Ciudad de Melilla
title_short: (29016) Málaga - 23 Paseo Marítimo Ciudad de Melilla
description: Parking next to the seafront. Beautiful view. Nice games for children and beach showers. Car noise can be heard as it is on the avenue. Very close to the center and Pier 1. Excellent for visiting the city and swimming in the sea. Prohibited for mobile homes.

title: (29011) Málaga - 39 Avenida del Arroyo de los Ángeles
title_short: (29011) Málaga - 39 Avenida del Arroyo de los Ángeles
description: Huge parking lot, a couple of campervans inside.

address.street: 39 Avenida del Arroyo de los Ángeles

title: (29650) Mijas - 8 Carretera Coín
description: It is already along the road very close to the center

title: (29650) Mijas - 11 Camino de los Caños
description: Parking on the other side of Plaza Virgen de la Peña.

title: (29016) Málaga - Calle Guillén Sotelo
description: This place is a bit louder due to several streets that are nearby, but you are right in the center. In addition, direct access to the Castillo de Gibralfaro and a little further to the Alcazaba. You can park for free on Saturdays from 2 p.m. to Monday at 9 a.m. (See photos for the rest of the prices) The place is a one-way street with parking lanes on both sides (total approx. 150m), you should only park behind the blue (!) line!

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 2 Calle Real
description: Washing with a pressure gun. It has a platform to reach the top of your AC.

name: Andes el Grande
title: (29120) Andes el Grande
description: Andes El Grande is a hostel / airbnb / camper place where you can enjoy hostel life, but still sleep in your camper. You can use internet, shower, toilets, swimming pool, etc. for €15/night. Andes El Grande is a magical place, recommended!

title: (29016) Málaga - 12 Paseo Reding
description: Cervantes private parking. Next to the La Malagueta bullding. Height 2.2m perfect for camper vans with a roof. It has toilets and a toilet with a baby changing table. Very central, 5min walk to the port and just under the Alcazaba.

title: (29650) Mijas - 11T Urbanizacion el Maro
description:
Esplanade between the mountains and with great views of the sea.
very calm.
highly recommended.

title: (29013) Málaga - 16 Calle Refino
description: Guarded parking, suitable for small buses/vans. Our bus is about 2.4m and fits without any problems, there were also taller sprinters in the parking lot. The access road through the city is sometimes quite narrow.

title: (29011) Málaga - 10 Calle Montserrat Roig
description: This helps out: secure street, which has space.
